abstract: Jazz at Lincoln Center and Rockefeller Foundation introduce education outreach program Jazz for Young People: The Resilient Cities Tour, targeting students at 60 disadvantaged schools across five cities.
lead_paragraph: “Jazz for Young People: The Resilient Cities Tour” will link live performances to American history, and visit 60 schools in five cities.
snippet: “Jazz for Young People: The Resilient Cities Tour” will link live performances to American history, and visit 60 schools in five cities....

headline.main: Jazz at Lincoln Center and Rockefeller Foundation Pair Up for School Tour
headline.print_headline: Jazz at Lincoln Center Creates New Outreach
